did.head: Collection Summary
did.unittitle: Records of the Harshaw Mining Company 1880-1908 (bulk 1880-1882)
did.abstract: The Harsaw Mining Company was based in San Francisco and New York City, operating in the Harshaw Mining District, Santa Cruz County, Arizona. This collection includes contracts, assay reports, and general inventories of company.

bioghist.head: Biographical Note
bioghist.p: Mining company, based in San Francisco and New York City, operating in the Harshaw Mining District, Santa Cruz County, Ariz.

arrangement.head: Arrangement
arrangement.p: This collection is organized into two series.

list.item: Series I: Contracts and assay reports, 1880-1881
Series II: Equipment and supplies ledger, 1881-1882, 1908

scopecontent.head: Scope and Content Note
scopecontent.p: Contracts, assay reports, and general inventories of company. Consists of two ledgers. The first contains 27 pages of contracts and assay reports; the second has inventories of the company followed by a newer section, 1908, in another hand, which contains company store accounts, p. 124-153.
